plot: Several young girls in an isolated village are killed successively. Later it is found that the murderer seems to kill them according to a Bouncing Ball Ballad, gradually shown in the film.
title: The Devil\'s ballad (Akuma no temari-uta)
plot_es: Several young girls in an isolated village are killed successively. Later it is found that the murderer seems to kill them according to a Bouncing Ball Ballad, gradually shown in the film.
plot_en: Several young girls in an isolated village are killed successively. Later it is found that the murderer seems to kill them according to a Bouncing Ball Ballad, gradually shown in the film.
